ygData.subject: RE: Song Analysis Statistics?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... One thing that would help Rokenn is if we all just test the damages ourselves (and with a friend) and send them in.  Level, with instrument, without
ygData.messageBody:
> From: Gabryel <gabryel@...>
>
> One thing that I was REALLY hoping to find in the song
> analysis database
> was more information about the actual damage statistics caused by DoT
> songs such as CoD and DDD with instruments and without. Considering I
> rarely use weapons any more except in certain circumstances,
> knowing the
> damage that I am doing with these songs would help me better evaluate
> which is better to use in a given situation.

One thing that would help Rokenn is if we all just test the damages
ourselves (and with a friend) and send them in. Level, with instrument,
without instrument, appropriate skill level, etc, etc. It would be REALLY
nice to find out what those damage formulas are.

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 32 Bard [Povar]
